193.147.12.25/24 --> 11000001.10010011.00001100.00000000

50+2<64=2^6 --> 6 bit hostId
32-24-6=2 bit subnetId
2^6-2-50=12 IP galdu
11000001.10010011.00001100.SSHHHHHH
11000001.10010011.00001100.00000000
11000001.10010011.00001100.01000000
11000001.10010011.00001100.10000000
11000001.10010011.00001100.11000000

12+2=14<16=2^4 --> 4 b it hostId
32-26-4=2 bit subnetId
2^4-2-12=2 IP galdu
11000001.10010011.00001100.11SSHHHH
11000001.10010011.00001100.11000000
11000001.10010011.00001100.11010000
11000001.10010011.00001100.11100000
11000001.10010011.00001100.11110000

---------------------------------------------------

172.16.0.0/16 --> 10101100.00010000.00000000.00000000
A) 128 +2+1=131
B) 300+2+1=303
C) 35+2+1=38
D) 2+2=4
E) 2+2=4
131+303+38+4+4=480<2^16

B) 2^9=512>303 --> 9 bit hostId
   32-16-9=7 bit subnetId
   2^7=128 azpisare

   10101100.00010000.SSSSSSSH.HHHHHHHH
   10101100.00010000.00000000.00000000 --> 172.16.0.0/23
   10101100.00010000.00000001.11111111 --> 172.16.1.255

   10101100.00010000.00000010.00000000

A) 2^8=256>131 --> 8 bit hostId
   32-23-8=1 bit subnetId
   2^1=2 azpisare

   10101100.00010000.0000001S.HHHHHHHH
   10101100.00010000.00000010.00000000 --> 172.16.2.0/24
   10101100.00010000.00000010.11111111 --> 172.16.2.255

   10101100.00010000.00000011.00000000 

C) 2^6=64>38 --> 6 bit hostId
   32-24-6=2 bit subnetId
   2^2=4 azpisare

   10101100.00010000.00000011.SSHHHHHH
   10101100.00010000.00000011.00000000 --> 172.16.3.0/26
   10101100.00010000.00000011.00111111 --> 172.16.3.63

D eta E)
   2^2=4 --> 2 bit hostId
   32-26-2=4 bit subnetId
   2^4=16 azpisare
   
   10101100.00010000.00000011.01SSSSHH
   10101100.00010000.00000011.01000000 --> 172.16.3.64/30 (D)
   10101100.00010000.00000011.01000011 --> 172.16.3.67

   10101100.00010000.00000011.01000100 --> 172.16.3.68/30 (E)
   10101100.00010000.00000011.01000111 --> 172.16.3.71




R1)
	Sarea		Interfazea	Next Hop	Metrika
(A)	172.16.2.0	eth1		X		0
(D)	172.16.3.64	eth0		X		0
(B)	172.16.0.0	eth0		172.16.3.66	1
(E)	172.16.3.68	eth0		172.16.3.66	1
(C)	172.16.3.0	eth0		172.16.3.66	2

(E)	172.16.3.68	eth1		X		0

(C)	172.16.3.0	eth1		172.16.3.69	1

	Sarea		Interfazea	Next Hop	Metrika
(E)	172.16.3.68	eth0		X		0

(B)	172.16.0.0	eth0		172.16.3.70	1
